name: On The Back Of A Big Turtle
name_original: On The Back Of A Big Turtle
description:
Puzzle/Platformer for Beginners Circle Jam 3.

You're on a big turtle planet, you can move it from a planet to another to change the environement.
Everything is done by myself except for the music.

I'm happy to "finish" this project 10 minutes before the deadline. It took more than one week to find a idea, and i made it in less than 3 days.

There is so much to fix and improve.
